name: Pool Basketball Mania
description:
Pool Basketball Mania is a simple yet addictive basketball shooting game with realistic physics and great graphics. It has two game modes, but the target is the same - shoot basketballs into the basket to get scores. It is a funny time passing game that is suitable for everyone.

How to Play:
1. Press the basketball
2. Drag on the screen to adjust the shooting trajectory
3. Release finger to shoot basketball towards the basket
